text: Robert Edward "Bob" Rubin (born August 29, 1938) is an American lawyer, former cabinet member, and retired banking executive. He served as the 70th United States Secretary of the Treasury during the Clinton administration. Before his government service, he spent 26 years at Goldman Sachs, eventually serving as a member of the board and co-chairman from 1990 to 1992. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Council on Foreign Relations * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Treasury Category:Directors of the National Economic Council Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Yale University alumni Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert Rubin
